reviewText:
6 of the best episodes from Winx Club Season 1
Ep01 An Unexpected Event
Ep04 The Black - Mud Swamp
Ep05 Date With Disaster
Ep19 The Fall Of Magix
Ep23 Power Play
Ep24 The Witches' Siege

Winx Club: Power Play is just a compilation DVD with 6 of the British hand-picked episodes from the first season, but this is also another multi-region DVD with Region 2 & 4 imprinted on it, so Australia and Brazil can also enjoy without mods. You might be better off with the complete 1st season sets.
